SELECT r.type_id, MAX(r.create_time) as create_time FROM `wk_examine_record` r WHERE r.record_id IN ( SELECT t.record_id FROM `wk_examine_record_log` t JOIN wk_examine_record a ON t.record_id = a.record_id WHERE a.label = #{data.label} AND t.examine_status != 8
AND t.examine_status != 4
AND a.examine_status IN ( 0, 3 ) AND t.examine_status IN ( 0, 3 )
AND t.examine_status NOT IN ( 0, 3, 4 )
AND ( t.examine_user_id = #{userId} OR t.examine_role_id IN
#{item}
) GROUP BY t.record_id )
AND r.examine_id in (SELECT examine_id FROM wk_examine WHERE examine_init_id=#{data.categoryId})
GROUP BY r.type_id
ORDER BY r.create_time DESC
ORDER BY r.update_time DESC
ORDER BY r.create_time DESC
